Get Control.description: Gets the control on a form.

Get Control Type.description: Returns a string value that categorizes quick view controls.

Get Disabled.description: Gets a boolean value indicating whether the control is disabled.

Get Label.description: Returns the label for the quick view control.

Get Name.description: Returns the name assigned to the quick view control.

Get Parent.description: Returns a reference to the section object that contains the control.

Get Visible.description: Returns a value that indicates whether the quick view control is currently visible.

Is Loaded.description: Returns whether the data binding for the constituent controls in a quick view control is complete.

Refresh.description: Refreshes the data displayed in a quick view control.

Set Disabled.description: Sets the state of the control to either enabled or disabled.

Set Label.description: Sets the label for the quick view control.
